document_data.mainbody:
Valetta was a dragonborn priest of Gond at the House of Inspired Hands in Waterdeep in the early 1490s DR.
In 1492 DR, Valetta was in charge of taking care of the nimblewright Nim. Following the detonation of a fireball in Trollskull Alley that killed the gnome Dalakhar, Valetta discovered that a nimblewright of Nims own creation was involved in the attack and decided to strip Nim of all his construction materials.
